subject: Re: Pedal plate
description_text:
I donâ€™t have any issues waiting for the black base plate. Will it be
shipped out to me or do I have to send back the pedals I currently have?

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt, No need to return the pedals; we will send you the base plate directly once it arrives.

Thank you so much, both for your time and effort to resolve my issue.

Best regards,
Matthew
